name: markdown-converter
title: Markdown Converter
description: Convert rich text from clipboard into Markdown format
author: ewilderj

commands.name: convert-clipboard
commands.title: Convert Clipboard to Markdown
commands.description: Convert rich text from clipboard into Markdown format

commands.name: convert-clipboard-org
commands.title: Convert Clipboard to Org
commands.description: Convert rich text from clipboard into Org-mode format

commands.name: convert-to-html
commands.title: Convert Clipboard to HTML
commands.description: Convert Markdown or Org text to generic HTML rich text

commands.name: convert-to-google-docs
commands.title: Convert Clipboard to Google Docs
commands.description: Convert Markdown or Org text to Google Docs optimized rich text

commands.name: convert-to-word
commands.title: Convert Clipboard to Word 365
commands.description: Convert Markdown or Org text to Microsoft Word optimized rich text

commands.name: convert-to-slack
commands.title: Convert Clipboard to Slack
commands.description: Convert Markdown or Org text to Slack mrkdwn format

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
